description.en:
"Plata Network is a racing themed project built on the Elrond blockchain.

The passion for motorsports, combined with the technology brought to the world by the Romanian team, fuels the project. The $PLATA ESDT (Elrond Standard Digital Token) and the NFTs (Non-Fungible Tokens) published are both Stake eligible and integrated into the Plata Power Play-to-Earn game, offering real incentives for passive income. $PLATA is listed on Maiar Exchange, and besides Staking, it can be used on our platforms, on different partner and non-affiliated platforms, and represents voting power in the Plata Network DAO."
